About

Cortico provides patient intake and telehealth software for OSCAR EMR.

During the current COVID-19 crisis, we are providing Oscar-integrated Telehealth free for 90 days to help clinics keep working at full speed. Read more here.

Cortico Blog

  • Cortico Blog
  • help@cortico.ca
  • countable-web

Cortico software is designed for physicians & clinic managers to eliminate overhead and reduce in-clinic wait times. Our blog focuses on relevant content, especially telehealth & EMR.
